Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Decent FoV on this megapixel fixed dome day night  camera. Have video pulled into Synology NAS no issues. Video definitely not as clean as some other manufacturers (Axis) but for the price on this thing you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Works great as an outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph Steffee
Reviews.Content: I have this mounted above my porch underneath an overhang. Worked great with no problems for the past year. POE makes this much easier to route power & data to. The images are crisp and clear. Night vision is very good as well. The WebUI is easy to use and you can set it up to email you a photo when it detects motion which has been useful.A few nights ago I caught someone on my front porch at 1:30 AM peering in the window and scoping out around the fence and back yard. They left but I called the police who caught them breaking into a house an hour or so later. Worthwhile purchase for any homeowner.

Reviews.Title: Awesome IP POE network cam. Was everything that I expected.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Guerrero
Reviews.Content: like all the features of the camera for the application. great image quality and easy to configure.stumbled a little with the client software but once I played with it for a little while, it was easy after that.I would recomment this produt for a small office location or home.

Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: Kevin S.
Reviews.Content: No issues.  Works great with synology.  Great night vision.  About a 70 degrease angle.  Will buy more of these in the future

ProductInfo.Features:
Indoor night vision for up to 12 m (40 ft.)
Megapixel resolution with H.264 compression
Adjustable fixed position camera
Save installation costs with Power over Ethernet (PoE)
DHCP IPv6 Auto Configuration
ProductInfo.Name: TRENDnet Megapixel PoE Dome Network Surveillance Camera with Night Vision, TV-IP262PI (Black)
